document_title: What is melasma? Causes of formation and notes you need to know
subsection_name: nam-da.json_5_Who is at risk of melasma?
subsection_content: Women! The American Academy of Dermatology says that melasma is common in 90% of women, only 10% of men experience this condition. Accordingly, pregnant women, people with dark skin or hormonal disorders are at high risk of experiencing melasma.

nam da.json. Who is at risk of melasma?
Women! The American Academy of Dermatology says that melasma is common in 90% of women, only 10% of men experience this condition. Accordingly, pregnant women, people with dark skin or hormonal disorders are at high risk of experiencing melasma.
